vendorName: The Right Door Consulting and Solutions
extraDescription: The department of National Defence has a requirement for a Special advisor to conduct a review on the effectiveness and efficiency of its current process regarding corporate submissions requiring Treasury Board or Ministerial approval.
comments: This item was not reported previously. This contract was competitively sourced. This contract is a call-up against a Public Services and Procurement Canada procurement tool.
